meanings.definition: The act or process of recording and adding a voice narration to a film or video.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys doing voiceovers for animated movies.
meanings.sent2: The voiceover in the documentary was informative.
meanings.sent3: The voiceovers in the movie made the characters come alive.
meanings.sent4: Her voiceover work added depth to the film.
meanings.sent5: The voiceovers created a captivating storytelling experience.

meanings.definition: A voice narration that is added to a film or video.
meanings.sent1: The voiceovers in the commercial were engaging.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to voiceovers in audiobooks.
meanings.sent3: The voiceovers in the movie trailer were dramatic.
meanings.sent4: His voiceover added emotion to the video.
meanings.sent5: The voiceovers enhanced the overall viewing experience.

meanings.definition: To provide a voice narration for a film or video.
meanings.sent1: She will voiceover the new documentary next week.
meanings.sent2: They often voiceover animated characters in movies.
meanings.sent3: He decided to voiceover the entire script in different accents.
meanings.sent4: The actor voiceovers for various commercials.
meanings.sent5: She voiceovers with passion and enthusiasm.
